body:
So, Atlas is great but there are a few things that I would like to be added again...

- Coloured writing when you bow someone (the distance you shot them from)
- Coloured badges (Don't know if they are added again)
- /namehistory <player> (I loved this feature)
- Donors get more credits for a kill/monument (Don't know if there still is)

So yeah, also, I heard that Atlas would bring in a shit ton of players, if anything, the players have gone down... Is Avicus gonna advertise when everything is 100% done or what?

title: Just a few things..

replies.body:
Itll be back dw, its just broken at this point because alot of the commands hadnt been coded i think

if you go to avicus.net/issues it redirects you to github and you can see bugs that people have reported so u can get an idea of what will be added
replies.body_tagged:
Itll be back dw, its just broken at this point because alot of the commands hadnt been coded i think

if you go to avicus.net/issues it redirects you to github and you can see bugs that people have reported so u can get an idea of what will be added

replies.body: its so laggy though, lag really doesnt happen only in a 5v5, were now playing 8v8 and its laggy, and when i was on a 15v15 it was so laggy until unplayable.
replies.body_tagged: its so laggy though, lag really doesnt happen only in a 5v5, were now playing 8v8 and its laggy, and when i was on a 15v15 it was so laggy until unplayable.
